---
title: "Theoretical Figure Code"
output: html_notebook
---



```{r setup}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
#pull in temp data
temp <- data.table(read.csv("figures/theoretical_figure_temp.csv"))
```

Make index column
```{r}
nrow(temp)

index_values <- seq(0, nrow(temp)-1, by = 1)

temp[,index := index_values]
```


Plot temp over a year

```{r temp over year}
ggplot(temp) +
  geom_smooth(aes(index, WTMP), se = F) +
  theme_classic()
```
